Does the scar have to do with a broken neck?
I have a scar on the back of my calf.
I don't know if it's cool, but it's large.
I was in Temecula doing a horse show.
And I was at the house for the weekend up there, an Airbnb,...
...and I was taking a shower after a long day,...
...and I tried to sit down in the shower and the back of my calf touched...
...like a little thing that was producing steam in the shower...
...and I got a second degree burn.
